com.ardic.android.iotignite.things

Class ThingManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ardic.android.iotignite.connection.ServiceInstance
      • com.ardic.android.iotignite.things.ThingManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IThingManager

    public final class ThingManager
extends com.ardic.android.iotignite.connection.ServiceInstance
implements IThingManager
    ThingManager class which implemented from IThingManager. Every node has one thing manager instance. This class is singleton. To get instance use : myNode.getThingManager(); or ... ThingManager.getInstance(myContext,myNode);
    Author:
    ARDIC

      • registerThing

        public boolean registerThing(Thing thing)
        Description copied from interface: IThingManager
        Register Thing to assigned Node. NOTE : You CANNOT add any Thing objects to "BuiltIn" node. This Node is reserved and using by device itself.
        Specified by:
        registerThing in interface IThingManager
        Parameters:
        thing - : Thing object which to be registered.
        Returns:
        true | false : Registration status of Thing.

      • getEveryThing

        public List<Thing> getEveryThing()
        Description copied from interface: IThingManager
        Get all Thing's managed by this manager. Returns Thing's list assigned to manager.
        Specified by:
        getEveryThing in interface IThingManager
        Returns:
        thingList : Returns list of Thing's if no object(s) as assigned that name returns empty list.

      • getThingByName

        public List<Thing> getThingByName(String thingName)
        Description copied from interface: IThingManager
        Get Thing object(s) with specified name. List of Thing's. List could be have zero to many elements. Because Thing name is NOT UNIQUE.
        Specified by:
        getThingByName in interface IThingManager
        Parameters:
        thingName - : Name of Thing(s).
        Returns:
        thingList : Returns Thing object . If no object(s) as assigned that name returns empty list.

      • getThingByID

        public Thing getThingByID(String thingID)
        Description copied from interface: IThingManager
        Get Thing object from ID. Thing ID is UNIQUE.
        Specified by:
        getThingByID in interface IThingManager
        Parameters:
        thingID - : ID of Thing.
        Returns:
        thingObject: Returns Thing object of assigned id. If no object as assigned that id returns null object.
